h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
content: Black Myth: Wukong is full of secrets, including hidden areas that can only be unlocked through solving a puzzle or finding a key item. One such secret area is in Chapter 1 and requires ringing three bells to access it. On this page, you'll find information on how to find each of the three bells and what awaits you in the hidden temple.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md", under the primary heading "How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area". The content is presented below:

Black Myth: Wukong is full of secrets, including hidden areas that can only be unlocked through solving a puzzle or finding a key item. One such secret area is in Chapter 1 and requires ringing three bells to access it. On this page, you'll find information on how to find each of the three bells and what awaits you in the hidden temple.
